name: Sabretooth
description: The mutant Victor Creed, called Sabertooth by many, is a feral assassin and mercenary. His mutant abilities grant him an enhanced healing rate, keen senses, and razor-sharp claws he uses to savage his foes. He is a long-time enemy ofWolverine. Their pasts intertwine through decades of conflict, and Sabertooth acts as a dark mirror of Wolverine's suppressed savage instincts.
